txt.en: 'It is a worthwhile trade! I am glad you agree. This is all I have though. Perhaps I will acquire more Motes soon!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will remove 55 Gúlmarks.</rgb>
The Protectors of the Vales have a small quantity of Motes available.
'If you are looking for Motes, I have just a few. I would be willing to part with them if you have any Gúlmarks.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly.</rgb>
Talk to the Protectors of the Vales to trade Gúlmarks for Motes.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can be completed weekly. Completing this quest will remove 55 Gúlmarks.</rgb>
Talk to the Protectors of the Vales
